name: Format\MoveInAnimation
description: The animation whereby a component moves in from the side of the screen.

properties.name: preferredStartingPosition
properties.description: Indicates which side of the screen should be the starting point of the animation. Valid values:

properties.name: type
properties.description: This animation’s type is always move_in.

properties.name: userControllable
properties.description: Indicates whether the animation occurs in response to user action (true) or happens automatically (false).
